name: Avanos Medical, Inc.
description: Avanos Medical, Inc. is a global medical technology company that specializes in providing innovative products and solutions for patients with medical conditions that require specialized care. Established in 2014, Avanos focuses on improving patient outcomes through its diverse portfolio of medical devices and consumables. The company operates primarily in two business segments: Surgical and Pain Management. The Surgical segment offers products such as wound care solutions, surgical drains, and advanced wound care devices that facilitate efficient healing processes. The Pain Management segment includes a range of solutions for managing acute and chronic pain, including innovative nerve block technology and anesthesia delivery systems. Avanos is committed to enhancing the quality of life for patients by developing products that are not only effective but also user-friendly for healthcare professionals. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Avanos continues to innovate and expand its product offerings, positioning itself as a leader in the medical device industry. The company’s dedication to patient safety and satisfaction drives its mission to deliver cutting-edge solutions that empower healthcare providers and improve clinical outcomes around the world.
